title: Clumsy Mechanic
description:
This game was created as part of the Global Game Jam 2020 in cooperation with some colleagues. It is a couch-coop style multiplayer game about fixing as many cars as possible within a certain time frame. A big part of my contributions here was:

  • Adding the player controls
  • Taking care of the general gameflow, regarding the rounds
  • Year: 2020
  • Platform: PC
  • Engine: Unity
